oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Central Library - Proposed Layout
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Central Library; libraries; 1990s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An early conceptual design for the first floor of the proposed Central Library on Poplar. Ultimately, the building completed in 2001 strongly resembles the building proposed here in 1996.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Staff Graphic
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Memphis - Memphis and Shelby County Public Library and Information Center - Central Library 9/22/1996
